hints.content:
Start at $110$ and count backwards by $1$'s. 

When you get to $105$, go one more.

To go one more, find $105$ on the chart.

![](${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/c7fb0e9db775b0647f20a52345cf52dd.png)

What comes right before $105$ on the chart?

question.content:
**What whole number comes right before $105$? **  

[[☃ input-number 1]]
